metadata.description: Comprehensive skills and helpers for building Python TUI applications (Textual), reactive notebooks (Marimo), and well-designed interfaces

plugins.name: textual-getting-started
plugins.description: Learn Textual basics: app structure, project setup, hot reload, and async patterns

plugins.name: textual-app-lifecycle
plugins.description: Master Textual app lifecycle: initialization, mount/unmount, configuration, and CLI args

plugins.name: textual-builtin-widgets
plugins.description: Complete guide to Textual built-in widgets: Button, Input, DataTable, Tree, Select, and more

plugins.name: textual-custom-widgets
plugins.description: Create reusable, encapsulated custom widgets for Textual applications

plugins.name: textual-layouts
plugins.description: Master Textual layout systems: Vertical, Horizontal, Grid, Dock, and Scrollable containers

plugins.name: textual-css-styling
plugins.description: Style Textual apps with TCSS: selectors, colors, borders, themes, and design tokens

plugins.name: textual-events-messages
plugins.description: Handle events and messages in Textual: @on decorator, custom messages, bubbling

plugins.name: textual-reactive-attributes
plugins.description: Build reactive UIs with auto-updating state, watch methods, and computed values

plugins.name: textual-screens-navigation
plugins.description: Multi-screen apps and modal dialogs: screen lifecycle, push/pop, navigation patterns

plugins.name: textual-snapshot-testing
plugins.description: Visual regression testing for Textual apps with pytest and snapshot testing

plugins.name: marimo-getting-started
plugins.description: Learn Marimo basics: reactive notebooks, cells, auto-execution, and notebook structure

plugins.name: marimo-widgets-ui
plugins.description: Interactive Marimo widgets: sliders, dropdowns, text inputs, data tables, forms

plugins.name: marimo-layouts
plugins.description: Organize Marimo notebooks with layouts: hstack, vstack, tabs, accordion, sidebar

plugins.name: marimo-claude-integration
plugins.description: Use Marimo with Claude Code: helper scripts, CLI commands, and workflows

plugins.name: cli-ux-principles
plugins.description: Human-first CLI design: progressive discovery, helpful errors, accessibility, best practices

plugins.name: general-ui-ux
plugins.description: UI/UX design principles: color theory, typography, accessibility, layout, WCAG compliance
